mapper.sql: c.id, c.pinyin, c.cityName, c.zipCode, c.openState, c.cityType, c.createTime, c.updateTime, c.version, c.isDeleted, c.createBy, c.updateBy, c.isHot, c.parentID, c.mergerName, c.cityCode, c.lng, c.lat

where 1=1 and c.id = #{condition.id} and c.pinyin = #{condition.pinyin} and c.cityName = #{condition.cityName} and c.zipCode = #{condition.zipCode} and c.openState = #{condition.openState} and c.cityType = #{condition.cityType} and c.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and c.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and c.version = #{condition.version} and c.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and c.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and c.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and c.isHot = #{condition.isHot} and c.parentID = #{condition.parentID} and c.mergerName = #{condition.mergerName} and c.cityCode = #{condition.cityCode} and c.lng = #{condition.lng} and c.lat = #{condition.lat}

where 1=1 and c.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(c.pinyin) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.pinyin}),'%')) and UPPER(c.cityName) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.cityName}),'%')) and UPPER(c.zipCode) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.zipCode}),'%')) and UPPER(c.openState) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.openState}),'%')) and UPPER(c.cityType) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.cityType}),'%')) and UPPER(c.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(c.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(c.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(c.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(c.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(c.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%')) and UPPER(c.isHot) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isHot}),'%')) and UPPER(c.parentID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.parentID}),'%')) and UPPER(c.mergerName) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.mergerName}),'%')) and UPPER(c.cityCode) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.cityCode}),'%')) and UPPER(c.lng) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.lng}),'%')) and UPPER(c.lat) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.lat}),'%'))
mapper.update: update city set pinyin=#{pinyin}, cityName=#{cityName}, zipCode=#{zipCode}, openState=#{openState}, cityType=#{cityType}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, createBy=#{createBy}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, isHot=#{isHot}, parentID=#{parentID}, mergerName=#{mergerName}, cityCode=#{cityCode}, lng=#{lng}, lat=#{lat}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from city c where c.id = #{id} and c.isDeleted = false

select from city c and c.pinyin like CONCAT(#{condition.p},'%') and c.lng BETWEEN #{condition.minLng} AND #{condition.maxLng} and c.lat BETWEEN #{condition.minLat} AND #{condition.maxLat} and c.cityName like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.keyword}),'%') ${orderByClause}
select from city c where c.parentID = (select case when c2.cityType=3 then c2.parentID else c2.id end from city c2 where c2.id = #{condition.cityID})
